for i in xrange(int(raw_input())):
    n=int(raw_input())
    nos=raw_input()
    x,y,z=nos.split()
    j=9
    count=0
    number=""
    while j>0 and count==0:
        number=str(j)+x+y+z
        for k in xrange(9,-1,-1):
            number=str(j)+x+y+z
            number=number+str(k)
            a=int(number)
            if a%n==0:
                count+=1
                print j,k,(int(number)/n)
                break
        j-=1
    if count==0:
        print "0"
